original: Dyberg, Erik Ragnar, direktör, Jönköping, f. 24/9/07 i Nordmaling, Västerb. 1., av sågverksförvalt. E. E. D. o. Esther Edström. G. 34 m. Ann-Mari Jonsson. Barn: Gun f. 35, Ulla 38, Erik 42, Marianne 45. — Stud:ex. v. Umeå h. a. 1. 25, Schartaus hand:-inst. 26-27. Föret, ett flert. res..t. olika europ. länder. Anst. i Sthlms Ensk. Bank 27-31, i Banque des Pays du Nord i Paris 28-29, v. Sv. Tändst. A-B i Jönköp. sed. 31, chef f. dess finans-avd. sed. 46. Hobbies: golf, bridge.
translated: Dyberg, Erik Ragnar, Director, Jönköping, born on September 24th, 1907 in Nordmaling, Västerbotten, the first child of the sawmill management team E.E.D. and Esther Edström. Married in 1934 to Ann-Mari Jonsson and has four children: Gun, born in 1935, Ulla in 1938, Erik in 1942, and Marianne in 1945. He attended Umeå high school, graduating in 1925, then Schartau's business institute in 1926-27. He worked in several European countries before joining Stockholm's Enskilda Bank from 1927 to 1931, Banque des Pays du Nord in Paris from 1928 to 1929, and then Swedish Match A-B in Jönköping since 1931. He became the head of its finance department in 1946. His hobbies include golfing and playing bridge.
